Actions: Each opponent either discards 1 card, mills 1 card, or destroy a target nonland permanent.[Instant/Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:3]
The Raid Monster creates ${numberOfPlayers} 2/2 artifact creature in its colors, each one attacks a seperate player this turn.[Creature][CMC:3]
The Raid Monster creates ${numberOfPlayers} 5/1 deathtouch enchantment artifact creature in its colors, each one attacks a seperate player this turn.[Creature][CMC:4]
Each players destroys target nonlegendary nonland permanent of the player's choice.[Instant/Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:2]
The Raid Monster deals 3 damage to each player and 2 to each planeswalker.[Instant/Sorcery][CMC:3]
The Raid Monster deals 4 damage to each player and 2 to each planeswalker.[Instant/Sorcery][CMC:3]
The Raid Monster deals 3 damage to each player and 2 to each planeswalker.[Instant/Sorcery][CMC:3]
The Raid Monster deals 4 damage to each player and 2 to each planeswalker.[Instant/Sorcery][CMC:3]
The Raid Monster gains 7 life, removes 3 infect counters, and deals 1 damage to each planeswalker.[Instant/Sorcery][CMC:2]
The Raid Monster gains 7 life, removes 3 infect counters, and deals 1 damage to each planeswalker.[Instant/Sorcery][CMC:2]
The Raid Monster gains 3 life and deals to ${diceRolledThisRound} damage to each creature it doesn't control.[Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:4]
Until the beginning of the Monster’s next turn, players cannot draw more than 3 cards.[Instant/Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:1]
Until the beginning of the Monster’s next turn, players cannot play more than 3 spells each turn.[Instant/Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:1]
Each opponent sacrifices 3 tokens they control.[Instant/Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:5]
For each opponent, return target enchantment of the player's choice to their hand.[Instant/Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:2]
The Raid Monster creates 1 ${currentRound+1}/${currentRound+1} artifact creature in its colors, and it attacks the player with the highest life total this turn.[Creature][CMC:3]

The Raid Monster creates 2 ${diceRolledThisRound}/${diceRolledThisRound} flying, deathtouch, enchantment artifact creature tokens. All creatures attack each combat if able until the Raid Monsters next turn.[Creature][CMC:5]
The Raid Monster creates 3 1/1 flying, enchantment artifact creature tokens. All creatures attack each combat if able until the Raid Monsters next turn.[Creature][CMC:4]

Each opponent sacrifices 1 enchantment they control, or lose life equal to the CMC of the cards that would be sacraficed. Effects that prevent or redirect damage may not be used to counter this loss of life.[Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:1]
For each opponent, destroy target artifact of the player's choice.[Artifact/Enchantment][CMC:2]

For each opponent, return target creature of the player's choice to their hand, or lose life equal to the CMC of the cards that would be returned. Effects that prevent or redirect damage may not be used to counter this loss of life.[Instant/Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:1]
Each player exiles one target enchantment from their graveyard and drains 3 life.[Instant/Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:1]
Each player exiles one target artifact from their graveyard and drains 3 life.[Instant/Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:1]
The player after the Raid Monster's turn exiles 1 permanent they control of their choice.[Instant/Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:1]

Until the Raid Monster's next turn creatures cannot attack the Raid Monster unless their controller pays (1) for each creature they control that's attacking the Raid Monster.[Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:2]
During each opponents next turn, counter the first card played.[Instant][CMC:4]
For each opponent, destroy a target nonland permament with the lowest converted mana cost, its controller creates a 1/1 artifact creature.[Instant/Sorcery/Enchantment/Creature][CMC:2]

Each opponent shuffles 2 nonland permanents of their choice into their decks, or lose life equal to the CMC of the cards that would be shuffled. Effects that prevent or redirect damage may not be used to counter this loss of life.[Instant/Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:1]
Each opponent exiles one target non-commander card of their choice.[Instant/Sorcery][CMC:2]
Until the Raid Monster’s next turn, they cannot lose the game.[Artifact/Enchantment][CMC:6]
Deal 2 damage to each creature and planeswalker.[Sorcery][CMC:3]
Tap all creatures that enter the battlefield until the Raid Monster’s next turn.[Artifacts/Enchantment][CMC:4]
Each opponent destroy's 1 nonland permanent and creates a 2/2 changeling creature token in the monster's colors.[Instant][CMC:2]
The Raid Monster copies each player's lowest converted mana cost creature; it must attack the respective player this turn.[Creature][CMC:6]
